<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92322</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92322</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Names of compounds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Namen der Mittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Noms des composés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nomes dos compostos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nomi dei residui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ονόματα των ενώσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nombres de compuestos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show that the names of some compounds like methane, water, and ammonia give no clue about their constituent elements.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compound</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen daß die Namen einiger 
Mittel wie Methan, Wasser und Ammoniakgeben kein Anhaltspunkt über 
ihre konstituierenden Elemente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations prouvent que les noms de 
certains composés comme le méthane, l'eau, et l'élasticité 
d'ammoniaque aucun indice au sujet de leurs éléments constitutifs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram que os nomes de 
alguns compostos como o methane, a água, e a elasticidade da amônia 
nenhum indício sobre seus elementos constituent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni indicano che i nomi di 
alcuni residui come metano, acqua e give dell'ammoniaca nessun indizio
circa i loro elementi costituenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις δείχνουν ότι τα ονόματα 
μερικών ενώσεων όπως το μεθάνιο, το ύδωρ, και την αμμωνία δεν 
δίνουν καμία ένδειξη για τα ιδρυτικά στοιχεία τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran que los nombres de 
algunos compuestos como el metano, el agua, y la elasticidad del 
amoníaco ninguna pista sobre sus elementos constitutivos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">composé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">composto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">residuo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ένωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">compuesto</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
